seo: Evolucare,ECSimage,远程命令执行漏洞,医疗管理系统
summary: 该插件用于检测Evolucare ECSimage应用的new_movie.php接口是否存在远程命令执行漏洞，攻击者可能利用该漏洞获取系统权限。
summary_en: This plugin is used to detect whether the new_movie.php interface of Evolucare ECSimage application has a remote command execution vulnerability, which attackers may exploit to gain system privileges.
